pokemon.name: BULBASAUR
pokemon.description: For some time after its birth, it grows by gaining nourishment from the seed on its back.

pokemon.name: IVYSAUR
pokemon.description: When the bud on its back starts swelling, a sweet aroma wafts to indicate the flower's coming bloom.

pokemon.name: VENUSAUR
pokemon.description: After a rainy day, the flower on its back smells stronger. The scent attracts other Pokemon.

pokemon.name: CHARMANDER
pokemon.description: The fire on the tip of its tail is a measure of its life. If healthy, its tail burns intensely.

pokemon.name: CHARMELEON
pokemon.description: In the rocky mountains where CHARMELEON live, their fiery tails shine at night like stars.

pokemon.name: CHARIZARD
pokemon.description: It is said that CHARIZARD's fire burns hotter if it has experienced harsh battles.

pokemon.name: SQUIRTLE
pokemon.description: Blerf.

pokemon.name: WARTORTLE
pokemon.description: It is said to live 10,000 years. Its furry tail is popular as a symbol of longevity.

pokemon.name: BLASTOISE
pokemon.description: The jets of water it spouts from the rocket cannons on its shell can punch through thick steel.

pokemon.name: CATERPIE
pokemon.description: It releases a stench from its red antenna to repel enemies. It grows by molting repeatedly.

pokemon.name: METAPOD
pokemon.description: A steel-hard shell protects its tender body. It quietly endures hardships while awaiting evolution.

pokemon.name: BUTTERFREE
pokemon.description: It loves the honey of flowers and can locate flower patches that have even tiny amounts of pollen.

pokemon.name: WEEDLE
pokemon.description: It eats its weight in leaves every day. It fends off attackers with the needle on its head.

pokemon.name: KAKUNA
pokemon.description: While awaiting evolution, it hides from predators under leaves and in nooks of branches.

pokemon.name: BEEDRILL
pokemon.description: Its best attack involves flying around at high speed, striking with poison needles, then flying off.

pokemon.name: PIDGEY
pokemon.description: It is docile and prefers to avoid conflict. If disturbed, however, it can ferociously strike back.

pokemon.name: PIDGEOTTO
pokemon.description: It flies over its wide territory in search of prey, downing it with its highly developed claws.

pokemon.name: PIDGEOT
pokemon.description: By flapping its wings with all its might, PIDGEOT can make a gust of wind capable of bending tall trees.

pokemon.name: RATTATA
pokemon.description: Cautious in the extreme, its hardy vitality lets it live in any kind of environment.

pokemon.name: RATICATE
pokemon.description: It whittles its constantly growing fangs by gnawing on hard things. It can chew apart cinder walls.

pokemon.name: SPEAROW
pokemon.description: It flaps its small wings busily to fly. Using its beak, it searches in grass for prey.

pokemon.name: FEAROW
pokemon.description: It has the stamina to fly all day on its broad wings. It fights by using its sharp beak.

pokemon.name: EKANS
pokemon.description: It sneaks through grass without making a sound and strikes unsuspecting prey from behind.

pokemon.name: ARBOK
pokemon.description: The pattern on its belly is for intimidation. It constricts foes while they are frozen in fear.

pokemon.name: PIKACHU
pokemon.description: It lives in forests with others. It stores electricity in the pouches on its cheeks.

pokemon.name: RAICHU
pokemon.description: It turns aggressive if it has too much electricity in its body. It discharges power through its tail.

pokemon.name: SANDSHREW
pokemon.description: To protect itself from attackers, it curls up into a ball. It lives in arid regions with minimal rainfall.

pokemon.name: SANDSLASH
pokemon.description: It curls up, then rolls into foes with its back. Its sharp spines inflict severe damage.

pokemon.name: NIDORAN
pokemon.description: While it does not prefer to fight, even one drop of the poison it secretes from barbs can be fatal.

pokemon.name: NIDORINA
pokemon.description: When it senses danger, it raises all the barbs on its body. These barbs grow slower than NIDORINO's.

pokemon.name: NIDOQUEEN
pokemon.description: Its entire body is armored with hard scales. It will protect the young in its burrow with its life.

pokemon.name: NIDORAN
pokemon.description: It scans its surroundings by raising its ears out of the grass. Its toxic horn is for protection.

pokemon.name: NIDORINO
pokemon.description: It has a violent disposition and stabs foes with its horn, which oozes poison upon impact.

pokemon.name: NIDOKING
pokemon.description: One swing of its mighty tail can snap a telephone pole as if it were a matchstick.

pokemon.name: CLEFAIRY
pokemon.description: Thought to live with others on quiet mountains, it is popular for its adorable nature.

pokemon.name: CLEFABLE
pokemon.description: Rarely seen by people, it is said to be drawn by the full moon to play at deserted lakes.

pokemon.name: VULPIX
pokemon.description: It controls balls of fire. As it grows, its six tails split from their tips to make more tails.

pokemon.name: NINETALES
pokemon.description: Its nine tails are said to be imbued with a mystic power. It can live for a thousand years.

pokemon.name: JIGGLYPUFF
pokemon.description: When it wavers its big, round eyes, it begins singing a lullaby that makes everyone drowsy.

pokemon.name: WIGGLYTUFF
pokemon.description: Its fine fur feels sublime to the touch. It can expand its body by inhaling air.

pokemon.name: ZUBAT
pokemon.description: Even though it has no eyes, it can sense obstacles using ultrasonic waves it emits from its mouth.

pokemon.name: GOLBAT
pokemon.description: It loves the blood of humans and Pokemon. It flies around at night in search of neck veins.

pokemon.name: ODDISH
pokemon.description: It often plants its root feet in the ground during the day and sows seeds as it walks about at night.

pokemon.name: GLOOM
pokemon.description: The honey it drools from its mouth smells so atrocious, it can curl noses more than a mile away.

pokemon.name: VILEPLUME
pokemon.description: Its petals are the largest in the world. As it walks, it scatters extremely allergenic pollen.

pokemon.name: PARAS
pokemon.description: Mushrooms named tochukaso grow on its back. They grow along with the host PARAS.

pokemon.name: PARASECT
pokemon.description: A mushroom grown larger than the host's body controls PARASECT. It scatters poisonous spores.

pokemon.name: VENONAT
pokemon.description: Its big eyes are actually clusters of tiny eyes. At night, its kind is drawn by light.

pokemon.name: VENOMOTH
pokemon.description: It flutters its wings to scatter dustlike scales. The scales leach toxins if they contact skin.

pokemon.name: DIGLETT
pokemon.description: A Pokemon that lives underground. Because of its dark habitat, it is repelled by bright sunlight.

pokemon.name: DUGTRIO
pokemon.description: Its three heads move alternately, driving it through tough soil to depths of over 60 miles.

pokemon.name: MEOWTH
pokemon.description: It is nocturnal in nature. If it spots something shiny, its eyes glitter brightly.

pokemon.name: PERSIAN
pokemon.description: A very haughty Pokemon. Among fans, the size of the jewel in its forehead is a topic of much talk.

pokemon.name: PSYDUCK
pokemon.description: If its usual headache worsens, it starts exhibiting odd powers. It can't remember doing so, however.

pokemon.name: GOLDUCK
pokemon.description: A Pokemon that lives in lakes. It swims faster than any human swimming champion.

pokemon.name: MANKEY
pokemon.description: It lives in treetop colonies. If one becomes enraged, the whole colony rampages for no reason.

pokemon.name: PRIMEAPE
pokemon.description: It grows angry if you see its eyes and gets angrier if you run. If you beat it, it gets even madder.

pokemon.name: GROWLITHE
pokemon.description: A Pokemon with a loyal nature. It will remain motionless until it is given an order by its Trainer.

pokemon.name: ARCANINE
pokemon.description: Its proud and regal appearance has captured the hearts of people since long ago.

pokemon.name: POLIWAG
pokemon.description: Its skin is so thin, its internal organs are visible. It has trouble walking on its newly grown feet.

pokemon.name: POLIWHIRL
pokemon.description: The spiral pattern on its belly subtly undulates. Staring at it gradually causes drowsiness.

pokemon.name: POLIWRATH
pokemon.description: With its extremely tough muscles, it can keep swimming in the Pacific Ocean without resting.

pokemon.name: ABRA
pokemon.description: It sleeps for 18 hours a day. Even when awake, it teleports itself while remaining seated.

pokemon.name: KADABRA
pokemon.description: If one is nearby, an eerie shadow appears on TV screens. Seeing the shadow is said to bring bad luck.

pokemon.name: ALAKAZAM
pokemon.description: Its superb memory lets it recall everything it has experienced from birth. Its IQ exceeds 5,000.

pokemon.name: MACHOP
pokemon.description: It hefts a GRAVELER repeatedly to strengthen its entire body. It uses every type of martial arts.

pokemon.name: MACHOKE
pokemon.description: MACHOKE's boundless power is very dangerous, so it wears a belt that suppresses its energy.

pokemon.name: MACHAMP
pokemon.description: It punches with its four arms at blinding speed. It can launch 1,000 punches in two seconds.

pokemon.name: BELLSPROUT
pokemon.description: It prefers hot and humid environments. It is quick at capturing prey with its vines.

pokemon.name: WEEPINBELL
pokemon.description: A Pokemon that appears to be a plant. It captures unwary prey by dousing them with a toxic powder.

pokemon.name: VICTREEBEL
pokemon.description: It pools in its mouth a fluid with a honeylike scent, which is really an acid that dissolves anything.

pokemon.name: TENTACOOL
pokemon.description: Its body is virtually composed of water. It shoots strange beams from its crystal-like eyes.

pokemon.name: TENTACRUEL
pokemon.description: With 80 tentacles for ensnaring victims, it prevents escape until the prey is weakened by poison.

pokemon.name: GEODUDE
pokemon.description: Many live on mountain trails and remain half buried while keeping an eye on climbers.

pokemon.name: GRAVELER
pokemon.description: GRAVELER make their homes on sheer cliff faces by gouging out numerous horizontal holes.

pokemon.name: GOLEM
pokemon.description: It sheds its hide once a year. Its boulderlike body is so tough, even dynamite can't harm it.

pokemon.name: PONYTA
pokemon.description: About an hour after birth, its fiery mane and tail grow out, giving it an impressive appearance.

pokemon.name: RAPIDASH
pokemon.description: It gallops at nearly 150 mph. With its mane blazing ferociously, it races as if it were an arrow.

pokemon.name: SLOWPOKE
pokemon.description: Although slow, it is skilled at fishing with its tail. It does not feel pain if its tail is bitten.

pokemon.name: SLOWBRO
pokemon.description: Though usually dim witted, it seems to become inspired if the SHELLDER on its tail bites down.

pokemon.name: MAGNEMITE
pokemon.description: The units at its sides generate electromagnetic waves that keep it airborne. It feeds on electricity.

pokemon.name: MAGNETON
pokemon.description: It is actually three MAGNEMITE linked by magnetism. A group can set off a magnetic storm.

pokemon.name: FARFETCH'D
pokemon.description: It can't live without the stalk it holds. That's why it defends the stalk from attackers with its life.

pokemon.name: DODUO
pokemon.description: The brains in its two heads appear to communicate emotions to each other with a telepathic power.

pokemon.name: DODRIO
pokemon.description: When DODUO evolves into this odd breed, one of its heads splits into two. It runs at nearly 40 mph.

pokemon.name: SEEL
pokemon.description: A Pokemon that lives on icebergs. It swims in the sea using the point on its head to break up ice.

pokemon.name: DEWGONG
pokemon.description: In snow, the pure white coat covering its body obscures it from predators.

pokemon.name: GRIMER
pokemon.description: It was born when sludge in a dirty stream was exposed to the moon's X-rays. It appears among filth.

pokemon.name: MUK
pokemon.description: A toxic fluid seeps from its body. The fluid instantly kills plants and trees on contact.

pokemon.name: SHELLDER
pokemon.description: It swims backward by opening and closing its two shells. Its large tongue is always kept hanging out.

pokemon.name: CLOYSTER
pokemon.description: It fights by keeping its shell tightly shut for protection and by shooting spikes to repel foes.

pokemon.name: GASTLY
pokemon.description: This Pokemon's body is 95% made up of gases, which are blown away by strong gusts of wind.

pokemon.name: HAUNTER
pokemon.description: It can slip through any obstacle. It lurks inside walls to keep an eye on its foes.

pokemon.name: GENGAR
pokemon.description: It hides in shadows. It is said that if GENGAR is hiding, it cools the area by nearly 10 degrees F.

pokemon.name: ONIX
pokemon.description: When it travels underground, it causes rumbling and tremors. It can move at 50 mph.

pokemon.name: DROWZEE
pokemon.description: It can tell what people are dreaming by sniffing with its big nose. It loves fun dreams.

pokemon.name: HYPNO
pokemon.description: Seeing its swinging pendulum can induce sleep in three seconds, even in someone who just woke up.

pokemon.name: KRABBY
pokemon.description: It lives in burrows dug on sandy beaches. Its pincers fully grow back if they are broken in battle.

pokemon.name: KINGLER
pokemon.description: The larger pincer has 10,000- horsepower strength. However, it is so heavy, it is difficult to aim.

pokemon.name: VOLTORB
pokemon.description: It looks just like a Poke Ball. It is dangerous because it may electrocute or explode on touch.

pokemon.name: ELECTRODE
pokemon.description: It is known to drift on winds if it is bloated to bursting with stored electricity.

pokemon.name: EXEGGCUTE
pokemon.description: Its six eggs converse using telepathy. They can quickly gather if they become separated.

pokemon.name: EXEGGUTOR
pokemon.description: It is called "The Walking Jungle." If a head grows too big, it falls off and becomes an EXEGGCUTE.

pokemon.name: CUBONE
pokemon.description: When it thinks of its dead mother, it cries. Its crying makes the skull it wears rattle hollowly.

pokemon.name: MAROWAK
pokemon.description: From its birth, this savage Pokemon constantly holds bones. It is skilled in using them as weapons.

pokemon.name: HITMONLEE
pokemon.description: Its legs can stretch double. First-time foes are startled by its extensible reach.

pokemon.name: HITMONCHAN
pokemon.description: The arm-twisting punches it throws pulverize even concrete. It rests after three minutes of fighting.

pokemon.name: LICKITUNG
pokemon.description: Instead of hands, it uses its tongue, which is twice its height. Its sticky saliva grips anything.

pokemon.name: KOFFING
pokemon.description: Lighter-than-air gases in its body keep it aloft. The gases not only smell, they are also explosive.

pokemon.name: WEEZING
pokemon.description: It grows by feeding on gases released by garbage. Though very rare, triplets have been found.

pokemon.name: RHYHORN
pokemon.description: Its body is clad in a thick hide, and its tackles topple buildings. Unfortunately, it is not smart.

pokemon.name: RHYDON
pokemon.description: Its brain developed after it stood up on its hind legs. Its drill horn bores tunnels through solid rock.

pokemon.name: CHANSEY
pokemon.description: It is said to deliver happiness. Being compassionate, it shares its eggs with injured people.

pokemon.name: TANGELA
pokemon.description: It is shrouded by blue vines. No one has seen the face hidden behind this growth of vines.

pokemon.name: KANGASKHAN
pokemon.description: It raises its offspring in its belly pouch. It lets the baby out to play only when it feels safe.

pokemon.name: HORSEA
pokemon.description: It makes its nest in the shade of corals. If it senses danger, it spits murky ink and flees.

pokemon.name: SEADRA
pokemon.description: Its spines provide protection. Its fins and bones are prized as traditional medicine ingredients.

pokemon.name: GOLDEEN
pokemon.description: It swims elegantly by flittering its tail fin as if it were a dress. It has the look of a queen.

pokemon.name: SEAKING
pokemon.description: It makes its nest by hollowing out boulders in streams with its horn. It defends its eggs with its life.

pokemon.name: STARYU
pokemon.description: If its body is torn, it can grow back if the red core remains. The core flashes at midnight.

pokemon.name: STARMIE
pokemon.description: At the center of its body is a red core, which sends mysterious radio signals into the night sky.

pokemon.name: MR
pokemon.description: It is a pantomime expert that can create invisible but solid walls using miming gestures.

pokemon.name: SCYTHER
pokemon.description: It is nearly impossible to parry its attacking scythes. Its movements are like a ninja's.

pokemon.name: JYNX
pokemon.description: Its cries sound like human speech. However, it is impossible to tell what it is trying to say.

pokemon.name: ELECTABUZZ
pokemon.description: Half of all blackouts occur when this Pokemon appears at power plants and eats electricity.

pokemon.name: MAGMAR
pokemon.description: Born in the spout of a volcano, its body is covered by flames that shimmer like the sun.

pokemon.name: PINSIR
pokemon.description: It grips prey with its pincers until the prey is torn in half. What it can't tear, it tosses far.

pokemon.name: TAUROS
pokemon.description: Once it takes aim at its foe, it makes a headlong charge. It is famous for its violent nature.

pokemon.name: MAGIKARP
pokemon.description: It is said to be the world's weakest Pokemon. No one knows why it has managed to survive.

pokemon.name: GYARADOS
pokemon.description: Once it appears, its rage never settles until it has razed the fields and mountains around it.

pokemon.name: LAPRAS
pokemon.description: It loves crossing the sea with people and Pokemon on its back. It understands human speech.

pokemon.name: DITTO
pokemon.description: It has the ability to reconstitute its entire cellular structure to transform into whatever it sees.

pokemon.name: EEVEE
pokemon.description: A rare Pokemon that adapts to harsh environments by taking on different evolutionary forms.

pokemon.name: VAPOREON
pokemon.description: It has evolved to be suitable for an aquatic life. It can invisibly melt away into water.

pokemon.name: JOLTEON
pokemon.description: It controls 10,000-volt power and can raise all the fur on its body as if it were sharp needles.

pokemon.name: FLAREON
pokemon.description: It has a flame sac in its body. Its body temperature tops 1,650 degrees Fahrenheit before battle.

pokemon.name: PORYGON
pokemon.description: The world's first artificially created Pokemon. It can travel through electronic space.

pokemon.name: OMANYTE
pokemon.description: A Pokemon that was resurrected from a fossil using modern science. It swam in ancient seas.

pokemon.name: OMASTAR
pokemon.description: It is thought that this Pokemon became extinct because its spiral shell grew too large.

pokemon.name: KABUTO
pokemon.description: It is thought to have inhabited beaches 300 million years ago. It is protected by a stiff shell.

pokemon.name: KABUTOPS
pokemon.description: It is thought that this Pokemon came onto land because its prey adapted to life on land.

pokemon.name: AERODACTYL
pokemon.description: A Pokemon that roamed the skies in the dinosaur era. Its teeth are like saw blades.

pokemon.name: SNORLAX
pokemon.description: Its stomach can digest any kind of food, even if it happens to be moldy or rotten.

pokemon.name: ARTICUNO
pokemon.description: A legendary bird Pokemon. It can create blizzards by freezing moisture in the air.

pokemon.name: ZAPDOS
pokemon.description: A legendary Pokemon that is said to live in thunderclouds. It freely controls lightning bolts.

pokemon.name: MOLTRES
pokemon.description: One of the legendary bird Pokemon. It is said that its appearance indicates the coming of spring.

pokemon.name: DRATINI
pokemon.description: It is called the "Mirage Pokemon" because so few have seen it. Its shed skin has been found.

pokemon.name: DRAGONAIR
pokemon.description: If its body takes on an aura, the weather changes instantly. It is said to live in seas and lakes.

pokemon.name: DRAGONITE
pokemon.description: It is said to make its home somewhere in the sea. It guides crews of shipwrecks to shore.

pokemon.name: MEWTWO
pokemon.description: A Pokemon created by recombining MEW's genes. It's said to have the most savage heart among Pokemon.

pokemon.name: MEW
pokemon.description: Because it can use all kinds of moves, many scientists believe MEW to be the ancestor of Pokemon.

pokemon.name: CHIKORITA
pokemon.description: It uses the leaf on its head to determine the temperature and humidity. It loves to sunbathe.

pokemon.name: BAYLEEF
pokemon.description: The buds that ring its neck give off a spicy aroma that perks people up.

pokemon.name: MEGANIUM
pokemon.description: Its breath has the fantastic ability to revive dead plants and flowers.

pokemon.name: CYNDAQUIL
pokemon.description: It has a timid nature. If it is startled, the flames on its back burn more vigorously.

pokemon.name: QUILAVA
pokemon.description: It intimidates foes with the heat of its flames. The fire burns more strongly when it readies to fight.

pokemon.name: TYPHLOSION
pokemon.description: It attacks using blasts of fire. It creates heat shimmers with intense fire to hide itself.

pokemon.name: TOTODILE
pokemon.description: It has the habit of biting anything with its developed jaws. Even its Trainer needs to be careful.

pokemon.name: CROCONAW
pokemon.description: Once it bites down, it won't let go until it loses its fangs. New fangs quickly grow into place.

pokemon.name: FERALIGATR
pokemon.description: It usually moves slowly, but it goes at blinding speed when it attacks and bites prey.

pokemon.name: SENTRET
pokemon.description: It has a very nervous nature. It stands up high on its tail so it can scan wide areas.

pokemon.name: FURRET
pokemon.description: The mother puts its offspring to sleep by curling up around them. It corners foes with speed.

pokemon.name: HOOTHOOT
pokemon.description: It always stands on one foot. Even when attacked, it does not brace itself using both feet.

pokemon.name: NOCTOWL
pokemon.description: Its eyes are special. They can pick out objects as long as there is the tiniest amount of light.

pokemon.name: LEDYBA
pokemon.description: It is so timid, it can't move if it isn't with a swarm of others. It conveys its feelings with scent.

pokemon.name: LEDIAN
pokemon.description: It uses starlight as energy. When more stars appear at night, the patterns on its back grow larger.

pokemon.name: SPINARAK
pokemon.description: It sets a trap by spinning a web with thin but strong silk. It waits motionlessly for prey to arrive.

pokemon.name: ARIADOS
pokemon.description: It attaches silk to its prey and sets it free. Later, it tracks the silk to the prey and its friends.

pokemon.name: CROBAT
pokemon.description: Having four wings enables it to fly faster and more quietly. It turns active when the night comes.

pokemon.name: CHINCHOU
pokemon.description: It discharges positive and negative electricity from its antenna tips to shock its foes.

pokemon.name: LANTURN
pokemon.description: LANTURN's light can shine up from great depths. It is nicknamed "The Deep-Sea Star."

pokemon.name: PICHU
pokemon.description: The electric pouches on its cheeks are still small. They cannot store much electricity yet.

pokemon.name: CLEFFA
pokemon.description: Its silhouette is like a star. It is believed to arrive riding on shooting stars.

pokemon.name: IGGLYBUFF
pokemon.description: It has a soft and bouncy body. Once it starts bouncing, it becomes impossible to stop.

pokemon.name: TOGEPI
pokemon.description: Its shell is said to be stuffed with happiness that it shares with kindhearted people.

pokemon.name: TOGETIC
pokemon.description: It is said to appear in front of kindly people to scatter a glowing down called "joy dust."

pokemon.name: NATU
pokemon.description: It picks food from cactus plants, deftly avoiding buds and spines. It seems to skip about to move.

pokemon.name: XATU
pokemon.description: This odd Pokemon can see both the past and the future. It eyes the sun's movement all day.

pokemon.name: MAREEP
pokemon.description: Its fluffy coat swells to double when static electricity builds up. Touching it can be shocking.

pokemon.name: FLAAFFY
pokemon.description: If its coat becomes fully charged with electricity, its tail lights up. It fires hair that zaps on impact.

pokemon.name: AMPHAROS
pokemon.description: The tip of its tail shines brightly. In the olden days, people sent signals using the tail's light.

pokemon.name: BELLOSSOM
pokemon.description: When the heavy rainfall season ends, it is drawn out by warm sunlight to dance in the open.

pokemon.name: MARILL
pokemon.description: Using its tail as a float, it dives underwater. It likes eating plants that grow on river bottoms.

pokemon.name: AZUMARILL
pokemon.description: It lives in rivers and lakes. In water, its coloring and patterns trick the vision of foes.

pokemon.name: SUDOWOODO
pokemon.description: Despite appearing to be a tree, its body is closer to rocks and stones. It is very weak to water.

pokemon.name: POLITOED
pokemon.description: It gathers groups of others as their leader. Its cries make POLIWAG obey.

pokemon.name: HOPPIP
pokemon.description: It drifts on winds. It is said that when HOPPIP gather in fields and mountains, spring is on the way.

pokemon.name: SKIPLOOM
pokemon.description: It blooms when the weather warms. It floats in the sky to soak up as much sunlight as possible.

pokemon.name: JUMPLUFF
pokemon.description: Blown by seasonal winds, it circles the globe, scattering cotton spores as it goes.

pokemon.name: AIPOM

evolution.name: Ambipom
evolution.condition: Level Up with Double Attack le

pokemon.description: It uses its tail to pluck fruits that are out of reach. Its tail is more adept than its real hands.

pokemon.name: Ho-oh
pokemon.description: Its feathers are in seven colors. It is said that anyone seeing it is promised eternal happiness.

pokemon.name: SUNKERN
pokemon.description: It suddenly falls out of the sky in the morning. A year after a cold summer, their population explodes.

pokemon.name: SUNFLORA
pokemon.description: It gets energy from warm sunlight and is known for its habit of moving in pursuit of it.

pokemon.name: YANMA
pokemon.description: Its eyes can see 360 degrees without moving its head. It won't miss prey--even those behind it.

pokemon.name: WOOPER
pokemon.description: It lives in cold water, half burying itself in mud at the bottom to sleep.

pokemon.name: QUAGSIRE
pokemon.description: It has a sluggish nature. It lies at the river's bottom, waiting for prey to stray into its mouth.

pokemon.name: ESPEON
pokemon.description: Its fur has the look and feel of velvet. The orb on its forehead glows when it uses psycho-power.

pokemon.name: UMBREON
pokemon.description: The light of the moon changed EEVEE's genetic structure. It lurks in darkness for prey.

pokemon.name: MURKROW
pokemon.description: It is believed that seeing this Pokemon at night will bring about ominous occurrences.

pokemon.name: SLOWKING
pokemon.description: Being bitten by SHELLDER gave it intelligence comparable to that of award-winning scientists.

pokemon.name: MISDREAVUS
pokemon.description: It loves to sneak up on people late at night, then startle them with its shrieklike cry.

pokemon.name: UNOWN
pokemon.description: Shaped like ancient writing, it is a huge mystery whether language or UNOWN came first.

pokemon.name: WOBBUFFET
pokemon.description: It desperately tries to keep its black tail hidden. It is said to be proof the tail hides a secret.

pokemon.name: GIRAFARIG
pokemon.description: Its tail also has a small brain. It bites to repel any foe trying to sneak up on it from behind.

pokemon.name: PINECO
pokemon.description: It looks just like a pinecone. Its shell protects it from bird Pokemon that peck it by mistake.

pokemon.name: FORRETRESS
pokemon.description: It is encased in a steel shell. Its peering eyes are all that can be seen of its mysterious innards.

pokemon.name: DUNSPARCE
pokemon.description: It digs into the ground with its tail and makes a mazelike nest. It can fly just a little.

pokemon.name: GLIGAR
pokemon.description: It sails on the winds with its limbs extended to strike from the sky. It aims for the prey's face.

pokemon.name: STEELIX
pokemon.description: Tempered underground under high pressure and heat, its body is harder than any metal.

pokemon.name: SNUBBULL
pokemon.description: Small Pokemon flee from its scary face. It is, however, considered by women to be cute.

pokemon.name: GRANBULL
pokemon.description: It is timid in spite of its looks. If it becomes enraged, however, it will strike with its huge fangs.

pokemon.name: QWILFISH
pokemon.description: It shoots the poison spines on its body in all directions. Its round form makes it a poor swimmer.

pokemon.name: SCIZOR
pokemon.description: It has a steel-hard body. It intimidates foes by upraising its eye-patterned pincers.

pokemon.name: SHUCKLE
pokemon.description: It stores berries in its shell. The berries eventually ferment to become delicious juices.

pokemon.name: HERACROSS
pokemon.description: It gathers in forests to search for tree sap, its favorite food. It's strong enough to hurl foes.

pokemon.name: SNEASEL
pokemon.description: It feeds on eggs stolen from nests. Its sharply hooked claws rip vulnerable spots on prey.

pokemon.name: TEDDIURSA
pokemon.description: It lets honey soak into its paws so it can lick them all the time. Every set of paws tastes unique.

pokemon.name: URSARING
pokemon.description: In its territory, it leaves scratches on trees that bear delicious berries or fruits.

pokemon.name: SLUGMA
pokemon.description: Its body is made of magma. If it doesn't keep moving, its body will cool and harden.

pokemon.name: MAGCARGO
pokemon.description: Its body temperature is roughly 18,000 degrees F. Flames spout from gaps in its hardened shell.

pokemon.name: SWINUB
pokemon.description: It loves eating mushrooms that grow under dead grass. It also finds hot springs while foraging.

pokemon.name: PILOSWINE
pokemon.description: Its shaggy coat makes it unable to see. It checks surroundings with its sensitive nose instead.

pokemon.name: CORSOLA
pokemon.description: Many live in the clean seas of the south. They apparently can't live in polluted waters.

pokemon.name: REMORAID
pokemon.description: It squirts water forcefully from its mouth to shoot down flying prey.

pokemon.name: OCTILLERY
pokemon.description: It lives in the gaps of boulders and in holes on the seafloor. Its suction cups grip prey tightly.

pokemon.name: DELIBIRD
pokemon.description: It carries food rolled up in its tail. It has the habit of sharing food with people lost in mountains.

pokemon.name: MANTINE

evolution.name: Mantine
evolution.condition: Level Up with Remoraid in part

pokemon.description: When the waves are calm, one may encounter a swarm of MANTINE swimming as if they are in flight.

pokemon.name: SKARMORY
pokemon.description: Despite being clad entirely in iron-hard armor, it flies at speeds over 180 mph.

pokemon.name: HOUNDOUR
pokemon.description: It conveys its feelings using different cries. It works in a pack to cleverly take down prey.

pokemon.name: HOUNDOOM
pokemon.description: Long ago, people imagined its eerie howls to be the call of the grim reaper.

pokemon.name: KINGDRA
pokemon.description: It lives in caves on the seafloor and creates giant whirlpools every time it moves.

pokemon.name: PHANPY
pokemon.description: It is strong despite its compact size. It can easily pick up and carry an adult human on its back.

pokemon.name: DONPHAN
pokemon.description: It attacks by curling up, then rolling into its foe. It can blow apart a house in one hit.

pokemon.name: PORYGON2
pokemon.description: With planetary development software installed, it became capable of working in space.

pokemon.name: STANTLER
pokemon.description: Staring at its antlers creates an odd sensation as if one were being drawn into their centers.

pokemon.name: SMEARGLE
pokemon.description: It marks its territory by using its tail like a paintbrush. There are more than 5,000 different marks.

pokemon.name: TYROGUE
pokemon.description: It is famous for its eagerness to fight and always nurses injuries from challenging larger foes.

pokemon.name: HITMONTOP
pokemon.description: It fights while spinning like a top. The centrifugal force boosts its destructive power by ten.

pokemon.name: SMOOCHUM
pokemon.description: It tests everything by touching with its lips, which remember what it likes and dislikes.

pokemon.name: ELEKID
pokemon.description: It generates electricity by whirling its arms. However, it can't store the energy it makes.

pokemon.name: MAGBY
pokemon.description: Its body temperature is around 1,100 degrees F. It is healthy if it is breathing yellow flames.

pokemon.name: MILTANK
pokemon.description: It is said that kids who drink MILTANK's milk grow up to become hearty, healthy adults.

pokemon.name: BLISSEY
pokemon.description: This kindhearted Pokemon nurses sick Pokemon to health. It senses feelings of sadness.

pokemon.name: RAIKOU
pokemon.description: It is said to have fallen with lightning. It can fire thunderbolts from the rain clouds on its back.

pokemon.name: ENTEI
pokemon.description: It is said that when it roars, a volcano erupts somewhere around the globe.

pokemon.name: SUICUNE
pokemon.description: It races around the world to purify fouled water. It dashes away with the north wind.

pokemon.name: LARVITAR
pokemon.description: A Pokemon that eats soil. Once it has eaten a large mountain, it goes to sleep so it can grow.

pokemon.name: PUPITAR
pokemon.description: Its body is as hard as bedrock. By venting pressurized gas, it can launch itself like a rocket.

pokemon.name: TYRANITAR
pokemon.description: If it rampages, it knocks down mountains and buries rivers. Maps must be redrawn afterward.

pokemon.name: LUGIA
pokemon.description: It sleeps in a deep-sea trench. If it flaps its wings, it is said to cause a 40-day storm.

pokemon.name: CELEBI
pokemon.description: It has the power to travel across time, but it is said to appear only in peaceful times.

pokemon.name: TREECKO
pokemon.description: The soles of its feet are covered by countless tiny spikes, enabling it to walk on walls and ceilings.

pokemon.name: GROVYLE
pokemon.description: It lives in dense jungles. While closing in on its prey, it leaps from branch to branch.

pokemon.name: SCEPTILE
pokemon.description: The leaves that grow on its arms can slice down thick trees. It is without peer in jungle combat.

pokemon.name: TORCHIC
pokemon.description: A fire burns inside, so it feels very warm to hug. It launches fireballs of 1,800 degrees F.

pokemon.name: COMBUSKEN
pokemon.description: Its kicking mastery lets it loose 10 kicks per second. It emits sharp cries to intimidate foes.

pokemon.name: BLAZIKEN
pokemon.description: Flames spout from its wrists, enveloping its knuckles. Its punches scorch its foes.

pokemon.name: MUDKIP
pokemon.description: To alert it, the fin on its head senses the flow of water. It has the strength to heft boulders.

pokemon.name: MARSHTOMP
pokemon.description: Its sturdy legs give it sure footing, even in mud. It burrows into dirt to sleep.

pokemon.name: LINOONE
pokemon.description: It charges prey at speeds over 60 mph. However, because it can only run straight, it often fails.

pokemon.name: SWAMPERT
pokemon.description: It can swim while towing a large ship. It bashes down foes with a swing of its thick arms.

pokemon.name: POOCHYENA
pokemon.description: A Pokemon with a persistent nature, it chases its chosen prey until the prey becomes exhausted.

pokemon.name: MIGHTYENA
pokemon.description: It chases down prey in a pack. It will never disobey the commands of a skilled Trainer.

pokemon.name: ZIGZAGOON
pokemon.description: It walks in zigzag fashion. It is good at finding items in the grass and even in the ground.

pokemon.name: WURMPLE
pokemon.description: It loves to eat leaves. If it is attacked by a STARLY, it will defend itself with its spiked rear.

pokemon.name: SILCOON
pokemon.description: It anchors itself by wrapping twigs with the silk from its body. It motionlessly awaits evolution.

pokemon.name: BEAUTIFLY
pokemon.description: It has an aggressive nature. It stabs prey with its long, narrow mouth to drain the prey's fluids.

pokemon.name: CASCOON
pokemon.description: It is hot inside its cocoon. All the cells in its body create the energy for it to evolve.

pokemon.name: DUSTOX
pokemon.description: A nocturnal Pokemon. Drawn by streetlights, they messily eat the leaves of trees lining boulevards.

pokemon.name: LOTAD
pokemon.description: It looks like an aquatic plant and serves as a ferry to Pokemon that can't swim.

pokemon.name: LOMBRE
pokemon.description: It has a mischievous spirit. If it spots an angler, it will tug on the fishing line to interfere.

pokemon.name: LUDICOLO
pokemon.description: If it hears festive music, all its muscles fill with energy. It can't help breaking out into a dance.

pokemon.name: SEEDOT
pokemon.description: When it dangles from a tree branch, it looks just like an acorn. It enjoys scaring other Pokemon.

pokemon.name: NUZLEAF
pokemon.description: The sound of its grass flute makes its listeners uneasy. It lives deep in forests.

pokemon.name: SHIFTRY
pokemon.description: By flapping its leafy fan, it can whip up gusts of 100 ft/second that can level houses.

pokemon.name: TAILLOW
pokemon.description: It has a gutsy spirit that makes it bravely take on tough foes. It flies in search of warm climates.

pokemon.name: SWELLOW
pokemon.description: It circles the sky in search of prey. When it spots one, it dives steeply to catch the prey.

pokemon.name: WINGULL
pokemon.description: It makes its nest on steep sea cliffs. Riding updrafts, it soars to great heights.

pokemon.name: PELIPPER
pokemon.description: It dips its large bill in the sea, then scoops up numerous prey along with water.

pokemon.name: RALTS
pokemon.description: It uses the horns on its head to sense human emotions. It is said to appear in front of cheerful people.

pokemon.name: KIRLIA
pokemon.description: It is highly perceptive of its Trainer's feelings. It dances when it is feeling happy.

pokemon.name: GARDEVOIR
pokemon.description: It will try to guard its trusted Trainer with its life. It has the ability to see the future.

pokemon.name: SURSKIT
pokemon.description: It appears as if it is skating on water. It draws prey with a sweet scent from the tip of its head.

pokemon.name: BRELOOM
pokemon.description: Its short arms stretch when it throws punches. Its technique is equal to that of pro boxers.

pokemon.name: MASQUERAIN
pokemon.description: Its antennae have eye patterns on them. Its four wings enable it to hover and fly in any direction.

pokemon.name: SHROOMISH
pokemon.description: It spouts poison spores from the top of its head. These spores cause pain all over if inhaled.

pokemon.name: SLAKOTH
pokemon.description: It spends nearly all its time in a day sprawled out. Just seeing it makes one drowsy.

pokemon.name: VIGOROTH
pokemon.description: Its heart beats at a tenfold tempo, so it cannot sit still for even a moment.

pokemon.name: SLAKING
pokemon.description: The world's laziest Pokemon. When it is lounging, it is actually saving energy for striking back.

pokemon.name: NINCADA
pokemon.description: It grows underground, sensing its surroundings using antennae instead of its virtually blind eyes.

pokemon.name: NINJASK
pokemon.description: Because it moves so quickly, it sometimes becomes unseeable. It congregates around tree sap.

pokemon.name: SHEDINJA
pokemon.description: A discarded bug shell that came to life. Peering into the crack on its back is said to steal one's spirit.

pokemon.name: WHISMUR
pokemon.description: Usually, its cries are like quiet murmurs. If frightened, it shrieks at the same volume as a jet plane.

pokemon.name: LOUDRED
pokemon.description: The shock waves from its cries can tip over trucks. It stamps its feet to power up.

pokemon.name: EXPLOUD
pokemon.description: Its howls can be heard over six miles away. It emits all sorts of noises from the ports on its body.

pokemon.name: MAKUHITA
pokemon.description: It toughens its body by slamming into thick trees. Many snapped trees can be found near its nest.

pokemon.name: HARIYAMA
pokemon.description: It loves to match power with big-bodied Pokemon. It can knock a truck flying with its arm thrusts.

pokemon.name: AZURILL
pokemon.description: A Pokemon that lives by water. It moves quickly on land by bouncing on its big tail.

pokemon.name: NOSEPASS
pokemon.description: Its nose is a magnet. As a result, this Pokemon always keeps its face pointing north.

pokemon.name: SKITTY
pokemon.description: It can't stop itself from chasing moving things, and it runs in a circle, chasing its own tail.

pokemon.name: DELCATTY
pokemon.description: It is highly popular among female Trainers for its sublime fur. It does not keep a nest.

pokemon.name: SABLEYE
pokemon.description: It hides in the darkness of caves. Its diet of gems has transformed its eyes into gemstones.

pokemon.name: MAWILE
pokemon.description: Attached to its head is a huge set of jaws formed by horns. It can chew through iron beams.

pokemon.name: ARON
pokemon.description: It usually lives deep in mountains. However, hunger may drive it to eat railroad tracks and cars.

pokemon.name: LAIRON
pokemon.description: For food, it digs up iron ore. It smashes its steely body against others to fight over territory.

pokemon.name: AGGRON
pokemon.description: While seeking iron for food, it digs tunnels by breaking through bedrock with its steel horns.

pokemon.name: MEDITITE
pokemon.description: It eats just one berry a day. By enduring hunger, its spirit is tempered and made sharper.

pokemon.name: MEDICHAM
pokemon.description: Through yoga training, it has honed its sixth sense. Its movements are elegant.

pokemon.name: ELECTRIKE
pokemon.description: Using electricity stored in its fur, it stimulates its muscles to heighten its reaction speed.

pokemon.name: MANECTRIC
pokemon.description: It discharges electricity from its mane. It creates a thundercloud overhead to drop lightning bolts.

pokemon.name: PLUSLE
pokemon.description: It cheers on friends with pom-poms made of sparks. It drains power from telephone poles.

pokemon.name: MINUN
pokemon.description: It cheers on friends. If its friends are losing, its body lets off more and more sparks.

pokemon.name: VOLBEAT
pokemon.description: It communicates with others by lighting up its rear at night. It loves ILLUMISE's sweet aroma.

pokemon.name: ILLUMISE
pokemon.description: With its sweet aroma, it guides VOLBEAT to draw signs with light in the night sky.

pokemon.name: ROSELIA
pokemon.description: ROSELIA raised on clean drinking water are known to grow vividly colored flowers.

pokemon.name: GULPIN
pokemon.description: Almost all its body is its stomach. Its harsh digestive juices quickly dissolve anything it swallows.

pokemon.name: SWALOT
pokemon.description: It swallows anything whole. It sweats toxic fluids from its follicles to douse foes.

pokemon.name: CARVANHA
pokemon.description: They swarm any foe that invades their territory. Their sharp fangs can tear out boat hulls.

pokemon.name: SHARPEDO
pokemon.description: Its fangs rip through sheet iron. It swims at 75 mph and is known as "The Bully of the Sea."

pokemon.name: WAILMER
pokemon.description: On sunny days, it lands on beaches to bounce like a ball and play. It spouts water from its nose.

pokemon.name: WAILORD
pokemon.description: The biggest of all Pokemon. It can dive to a depth of almost 10,000 feet on only one breath.

pokemon.name: NUMEL
pokemon.description: Its humped back stores intensely hot magma. In rain, the magma cools, slowing its movement.

pokemon.name: CAMERUPT
pokemon.description: It has volcanoes on its back. If magma builds up in its body, it shudders, then erupts violently.

pokemon.name: TORKOAL
pokemon.description: It burns coal inside its shell for energy. It blows out black soot if it is endangered.

pokemon.name: SPOINK
pokemon.description: It bounces constantly, using its tail like a spring. The shock of bouncing keeps its heart beating.

pokemon.name: GRUMPIG
pokemon.description: It uses black pearls to amplify its psycho-power. It does an odd dance to gain control over foes.

pokemon.name: SPINDA
pokemon.description: No two SPINDA have the same pattern of spots. Its tottering step fouls the aim of foes.

pokemon.name: TRAPINCH
pokemon.description: It makes a conical pit in desert sand and lies in wait at the bottom for prey to come tumbling down.

pokemon.name: VIBRAVA
pokemon.description: It violently shudders its wings, generating ultrasonic waves to induce headaches in people.

pokemon.name: FLYGON
pokemon.description: It whips up sandstorms with powerful flaps of its wings. It is known as "The Desert Spirit."

pokemon.name: CACNEA
pokemon.description: By storing water in its body, this desert dweller can survive for 30 days without water.

pokemon.name: CACTURNE
pokemon.description: It becomes active at night, seeking prey that is exhausted from the day's desert heat.

pokemon.name: SWABLU
pokemon.description: Its wings are like cotton tufts. If it perches on someone's head, it looks like a cotton hat.

pokemon.name: ALTARIA
pokemon.description: It looks like a fluffy cloud when it is in flight. It hums with its soprano voice.

pokemon.name: ZANGOOSE
pokemon.description: It has feuded with SEVIPER for many generations. Its Razor Claws are its biggest weapons.

pokemon.name: SEVIPER
pokemon.description: For many generations, it has feuded with ZANGOOSE. It whets its bladed tail on rocks for battle.

pokemon.name: LUNATONE
pokemon.description: Because it turns active on nights of the full moon, it is said to have some link to the lunar phases.

pokemon.name: SOLROCK
pokemon.description: A new Pokemon species, rumored to be from the sun. It gives off light while spinning.

pokemon.name: BARBOACH
pokemon.description: It coats its entire body with a slimy fluid so it can squirm and slip away if grabbed.

pokemon.name: WHISCASH
pokemon.description: It is very territorial. It repels foes by setting off tremors that extend over a three-mile radius.

pokemon.name: CORPHISH
pokemon.description: Its hardy vitality enables it to adapt to any environment. Its pincers will never release prey.

pokemon.name: CRAWDAUNT
pokemon.description: It is a ruffian that uses its pincers to pick up and toss out other Pokemon from its pond.

pokemon.name: BALTOY
pokemon.description: It moves by spinning on its foot. It is a rare Pokemon that was discovered in ancient ruins.

pokemon.name: CLAYDOL
pokemon.description: An ancient clay figurine that came to life as a Pokemon from exposure to a mysterious ray of light.

pokemon.name: LILEEP
pokemon.description: It lived on the seafloor 100 million years ago and was reanimated scientifically.

pokemon.name: CRADILY
pokemon.description: It lives in the shallows of warm seas. When the tide goes out, it digs up prey from beaches.

pokemon.name: ANORITH
pokemon.description: A Pokemon ancestor that was reanimated from a fossil. It lived in the sea and hunted with claws.

pokemon.name: ARMALDO
pokemon.description: It went ashore after evolving. Its entire body is clad in a sturdy armor.

pokemon.name: FEEBAS
pokemon.description: It is famous for its shabby appearance. While populous, they tend to cluster in set locations.

pokemon.name: MILOTIC
pokemon.description: When people bicker, it is said to arise from the depths of lakes to becalm violent hearts.

pokemon.name: CASTFORM
pokemon.description: Its appearance changes with the weather. Recently, its molecules were found to be just like water.

pokemon.name: KECLEON
pokemon.description: It can freely change its body's color. The zigzag pattern on its belly doesn't change, however.

pokemon.name: SHUPPET
pokemon.description: It loves vengeful emotions and hangs in rows under the eaves of houses where vengeful people live.

pokemon.name: BANETTE
pokemon.description: A doll that became a Pokemon over its grudge from being junked. It seeks the child that disowned it.

pokemon.name: DUSKULL
pokemon.description: It doggedly pursues its prey wherever it goes. However, the chase is abandoned at sunrise.

pokemon.name: DUSCLOPS
pokemon.description: Its body is hollow. It is said that those who look into its body are sucked into the void.

pokemon.name: TROPIUS
pokemon.description: Because it continually ate only its favorite fruit, the fruit started growing around its neck.

pokemon.name: CHIMECHO
pokemon.description: To knock foes flying, it makes the air shudder with its cries. It converses using seven cries.

pokemon.name: ABSOL
pokemon.description: It senses coming disasters and appears before people only to warn them of impending danger.

pokemon.name: WYNAUT
pokemon.description: It grows strong by pushing up against others en masse. It loves eating sweet fruit.

pokemon.name: SNORUNT
pokemon.description: In the snow country, certain folklore says a house will prosper if a SNORUNT lives there.

pokemon.name: GLALIE
pokemon.description: To protect itself, it clads its body in an armor of ice, made by freezing moisture in the air.

pokemon.name: SPHEAL
pokemon.description: It rolls across ice floes to reach shore because its body is poorly shaped for swimming.

pokemon.name: SEALEO
pokemon.description: It habitually spins things on its nose. By doing so, it learns textures and odors.

pokemon.name: WALREIN
pokemon.description: It shatters ice with its big tusks. Its thick blubber repels not only the cold, but also enemy attacks.

pokemon.name: CLAMPERL
pokemon.description: It makes a single pearl during its lifetime. The pearl is said to amplify psychic power.

pokemon.name: HUNTAIL
pokemon.description: It lives deep in the sea. With a tail shaped like a small fish, it attracts unsuspecting prey.

pokemon.name: GOREBYSS
pokemon.description: It lives at the bottom of the sea. In the springtime, its pink body turns more vivid for some reason.

pokemon.name: RELICANTH
pokemon.description: A rare Pokemon discovered during a deep-sea exploration. It has not changed in over 100 million years.

pokemon.name: LUVDISC
pokemon.description: It lives in warm seas. It is said that a couple finding this Pokemon will be blessed with eternal love.

pokemon.name: BAGON
pokemon.description: Dreaming of one day flying, it practices by leaping off cliffs every day.

pokemon.name: SHELGON
pokemon.description: Within its rugged shell, its cells have begun changing. The shell peels off the instant it evolves.

pokemon.name: SALAMENCE
pokemon.description: As a result of its long-held dream of flying, its cellular structure changed, and wings grew out.

pokemon.name: BELDUM
pokemon.description: It converses with others by using magnetic pulses. In a swarm, they move in perfect unison.

pokemon.name: METANG
pokemon.description: It is formed by two BELDUM joining together. Its steel body won't be scratched if it collides with a jet.

pokemon.name: METAGROSS
pokemon.description: METANG combined to form it. With four brains, it has the intelligence of a supercomputer.

pokemon.name: REGIROCK
pokemon.description: Its entire body is made of rock. If any part chips off in battle, it attaches rocks to repair itself.

pokemon.name: REGICE
pokemon.description: Its body is made of ice from the ice age. It controls frigid air of -328 degrees Fahrenheit.

pokemon.name: LATIAS
pokemon.description: Its body is covered with a down that can refract light in such a way that it becomes invisible.

pokemon.name: REGISTEEL
pokemon.description: Tempered by pressure underground over tens of thousands of years, its body cannot be scratched.

pokemon.name: LATIOS
pokemon.description: A highly intelligent Pokemon. By folding back its wings in flight, it can overtake jet planes.

pokemon.name: KYOGRE
pokemon.description: It is said to have widened the seas by causing downpours. It had been asleep in a marine trench.

pokemon.name: GROUDON
pokemon.description: It had been asleep in underground magma ever since it fiercely fought KYOGRE long ago.

pokemon.name: RAYQUAZA
pokemon.description: It lives in the ozone layer far above the clouds and cannot be seen from the ground.

pokemon.name: JIRACHI
pokemon.description: It is said to have the ability to grant any wish for just one week every thousand years.

pokemon.name: DEOXYS
pokemon.description: An alien virus that fell to earth on a meteor underwent a DNA mutation to become this Pokemon.

pokemon.name: TURTWIG
pokemon.description: Made from soil, the shell on its back hardens when it drinks water. It lives along lakes.

pokemon.name: GROTLE
pokemon.description: It lives along water in forests. In the daytime, it leaves the forest to sunbathe its treed shell.

pokemon.name: TORTERRA
pokemon.description: Small Pokemon occasionally gather on its unmoving back to begin building their nests.

pokemon.name: CHIMCHAR
pokemon.description: It agilely scales sheer cliffs to live atop craggy mountains. Its fire is put out when it sleeps.

pokemon.name: MONFERNO
pokemon.description: To intimidate attackers, it stretches the fire on its tail to make itself appear bigger.

pokemon.name: INFERNAPE
pokemon.description: It uses a special kind of martial arts involving all its limbs. Its fire never goes out.

pokemon.name: PIPLUP
pokemon.description: Because it is very proud, it hates accepting food from people. Its thick down guards it from cold.

pokemon.name: PRINPLUP
pokemon.description: It lives alone, away from others. Apparently, every one of them believes it is the most important.

pokemon.name: EMPOLEON
pokemon.description: The three horns that extend from its beak attest to its power. The leader has the biggest horns.

pokemon.name: STARLY
pokemon.description: They flock in great numbers. Though small, they flap their wings with great power.

pokemon.name: STARAVIA
pokemon.description: It flies around forests and fields in search of bug Pokemon. It stays within a huge flock.

pokemon.name: STARAPTOR
pokemon.description: It has a savage nature. It will courageously challenge foes that are much larger.

pokemon.name: BIDOOF
pokemon.description: With nerves of steel, nothing can perturb it. It is more agile and active than it appears.

pokemon.name: BIBAREL
pokemon.description: It makes its nest by damming streams with bark and mud. It is known as an industrious worker.

pokemon.name: KRICKETOT
pokemon.description: It shakes its head back to front, causing its antennae to hit each other and sound like a xylophone.

pokemon.name: KRICKETUNE
pokemon.description: It crosses its knifelike arms in front of its chest when it cries. It can compose melodies ad lib.

pokemon.name: SHINX
pokemon.description: All of its fur dazzles if danger is sensed. It flees while the foe is momentarily blinded.

pokemon.name: LUXIO
pokemon.description: Its claws loose electricity with enough amperage to cause fainting. They live in small groups.

pokemon.name: LUXRAY
pokemon.description: It has eyes that can see through anything. It spots and captures prey hiding behind objects.

pokemon.name: BUDEW
pokemon.description: Over the winter, it closes its bud and endures the cold. In spring, the bud opens and releases pollen.

pokemon.name: ROSERADE
pokemon.description: It attracts prey with a sweet aroma, then downs it with thorny whips hidden in its arms.

pokemon.name: CRANIDOS
pokemon.description: It lived in jungles around 100 million years ago. Its skull is as hard as iron.

pokemon.name: RAMPARDOS
pokemon.description: Its powerful head butt has enough power to shatter even the most durable things upon impact.

pokemon.name: SHIELDON
pokemon.description: A Pokemon that lived in jungles around 100 million years ago. Its facial hide is extremely hard.

pokemon.name: BASTIODON
pokemon.description: Any frontal attack is repulsed. It is a docile Pokemon that feeds on grass and berries.

pokemon.name: BURMY
pokemon.description: To shelter itself from cold, wintry winds, it covers itself with a cloak made of twigs and leaves.

pokemon.name: WORMADAM
pokemon.description: When BURMY evolved, its cloak became a part of this Pokemon's body. The cloak is never shed.

pokemon.name: MOTHIM
pokemon.description: It loves the honey of flowers and steals honey collected by COMBEE.

pokemon.name: COMBEE
pokemon.description: A Pokemon formed by three others. It busily carries sweet floral honey to VESPIQUEN.

pokemon.name: VESPIQUEN
pokemon.description: Its abdomen is a honeycomb for grubs. It raises its grubs on honey collected by COMBEE.

pokemon.name: PACHIRISU
pokemon.description: It makes fur balls that crackle with static electricity. It stores them with berries in tree holes.

pokemon.name: BUIZEL
pokemon.description: It has a flotation sac that is like an inflatable collar. It floats on water with its head out.

pokemon.name: FLOATZEL
pokemon.description: It floats using its well-developed flotation sac. It assists in the rescues of drowning people.

pokemon.name: CHERUBI
pokemon.description: The small ball holds the nutrients needed for evolution. Apparently, it is very sweet and tasty.

pokemon.name: CHERRIM
pokemon.description: It blooms during times of strong sunlight. It tries to make up for everything it endured as a bud.

pokemon.name: SHELLOS
pokemon.description: Its colors and shapes differ from region to region. In the Sinnoh region, two types are confirmed.

pokemon.name: GASTRODON
pokemon.description: It has a pliable body without any bones. If any part of its body is torn off, it grows right back.

pokemon.name: AMBIPOM

evolution.name: Ambipom
evolution.condition: Level Up with Double Attack le

pokemon.description: To eat, it deftly shucks nuts with its two tails. It rarely uses its arms now.

pokemon.name: DRIFLOON
pokemon.description: A Pokemon formed by the spirits of people and Pokemon. It loves damp, humid seasons.

pokemon.name: DRIFBLIM
pokemon.description: It's drowzy in daytime, but flies off in the evening in big groups. No one knows where they go.

pokemon.name: BUNEARY
pokemon.description: It slams foes by sharply uncoiling its rolled ears. It stings enough to make a grown-up cry in pain.

pokemon.name: LOPUNNY
pokemon.description: An extremely cautious Pokemon. It cloaks its body with its fluffy ear fur when it senses danger.

pokemon.name: MISMAGIUS
pokemon.description: Its cries sound like incantations. Those hearing it are tormented by headaches and hallucinations.

pokemon.name: HONCHKROW
pokemon.description: Becoming active at night, it is known to swarm with numerous MURKROW in tow.

pokemon.name: GLAMEOW
pokemon.description: It claws if displeased and purrs when affectionate. Its fickleness is very popular among some.

pokemon.name: PURUGLY
pokemon.description: It is a brazen brute that barges its way into another Pokemon's nest and claims it as its own.

pokemon.name: CHINGLING
pokemon.description: It emits cries by agitating an orb at the back of its throat. It moves with flouncing hops.

pokemon.name: STUNKY
pokemon.description: It protects itself by spraying a noxious fluid from its rear. The stench lingers for 24 hours.

pokemon.name: SKUNTANK
pokemon.description: It sprays a vile-smelling fluid from the tip of its tail to attack. Its range is over 160 feet.

pokemon.name: BRONZOR
pokemon.description: Implements shaped like it were discovered in ancient tombs. It is unknown if they are related.

pokemon.name: BRONZONG
pokemon.description: One caused a news sensation when it was dug up at a construction site after a 2,000-year sleep.

pokemon.name: BONSLY
pokemon.description: It looks as if it is always crying. It is actually adjusting its body's fluid levels by eliminating excess.

pokemon.name: MIME
pokemon.description: It habitually mimics foes. Once mimicked, the foe cannot take its eyes off this Pokemon.

pokemon.name: HAPPINY
pokemon.description: It loves round white things. It carries an egg-shaped rock in imitation of CHANSEY.

pokemon.name: CHATOT
pokemon.description: It can learn and speak human words. If they gather, they all learn the same saying.

pokemon.name: SPIRITOMB
pokemon.description: A Pokemon that was formed by 108 spirits. It is bound to a fissure in an odd keystone.

pokemon.name: GIBLE
pokemon.description: It nests in small, horizontal holes in cave walls. It pounces to catch prey that stray too close.

pokemon.name: GABITE
pokemon.description: There is a long-held belief that medicine made from its scales will heal even incurable illnesses.

pokemon.name: GARCHOMP
pokemon.description: When it folds up its body and extends its wings, it looks like a jet plane. It flies at sonic speed.

pokemon.name: MUNCHLAX
pokemon.description: It wolfs down its weight in food once a day, swallowing food whole with almost no chewing.

pokemon.name: RIOLU
pokemon.description: The aura that emanates from its body intensifies to alert others if it is afraid or sad.

pokemon.name: LUCARIO
pokemon.description: It has the ability to sense the auras of all things. It understands human speech.

pokemon.name: HIPPOPOTAS
pokemon.description: It lives in arid places. Instead of perspiration, it expels grainy sand from its body.

pokemon.name: HIPPOWDON
pokemon.description: It blasts internally stored sand from ports on its body to create a towering twister for attack.

pokemon.name: SKORUPI
pokemon.description: It grips prey with its tail claws and injects poison. It tenaciously hangs on until the poison takes.

pokemon.name: DRAPION
pokemon.description: It has the power in its clawed arms to make scrap of a car. The tips of its claws release poison.

pokemon.name: CROAGUNK
pokemon.description: Its cheeks hold poison sacs. It tries to catch foes off guard to jab them with toxic fingers.

pokemon.name: TOXICROAK
pokemon.description: Its knuckle claws secrete a toxin so vile that even a scratch could prove fatal.

pokemon.name: CARNIVINE
pokemon.description: It attracts prey with its sweet- smelling saliva, then chomps down. It takes a whole day to eat prey.

pokemon.name: FINNEON
pokemon.description: After long exposure to sunlight, the patterns on its tail fins shine vividly when darkness arrives.

pokemon.name: LUMINEON
pokemon.description: It lives on the deep-sea floor. It attracts prey by flashing the patterns on its four tail fins.

pokemon.name: MANTYKE

evolution.name: Mantine
evolution.condition: Level Up with Remoraid in part

pokemon.description: A friendly Pokemon that captures the subtle flows of seawater using its two antennae.

pokemon.name: SNOVER
pokemon.description: It lives on snowy mountains. Having had little contact with humans, it is boldly inquisitive.

pokemon.name: ABOMASNOW
pokemon.description: It whips up blizzards in mountains that are always buried in snow. It is the abominable snowman.

pokemon.name: WEAVILE
pokemon.description: They live in cold regions, forming groups of four or five that hunt prey with impressive coordination.

pokemon.name: MAGNEZONE
pokemon.description: It evolved from exposure to a special magnetic field. Three units generate magnetism.

pokemon.name: LICKILICKY
pokemon.description: It wraps things with its extensible tongue. Getting too close to it will leave you soaked with drool.

pokemon.name: RHYPERIOR
pokemon.description: It puts rocks in holes in its palms and uses its muscles to shoot them. GEODUDE are shot at rare times.

pokemon.name: TANGROWTH
pokemon.description: It ensnares prey by extending arms made of vines. Losing arms to predators does not trouble it.

pokemon.name: ELECTIVIRE
pokemon.description: It pushes the tips of its two tails against the foe, then lets loose with over 20,000 volts of power.

pokemon.name: MAGMORTAR
pokemon.description: It blasts fireballs of over 3,600 degrees F from the ends of its arms. It lives in volcanic craters.

pokemon.name: TOGEKISS
pokemon.description: It will never appear where there is strife. Its sightings have become rare recently.

pokemon.name: YANMEGA
pokemon.description: By churning its wings, it creates shock waves that inflict critical internal injuries to foes.

pokemon.name: LEAFEON
pokemon.description: Just like a plant, it uses photosynthesis. As a result, it is always enveloped in clear air.

pokemon.name: GLACEON
pokemon.description: As a protective technique, it can completely freeze its fur to make its hairs stand like needles.

pokemon.name: GLISCOR
pokemon.description: It observes prey while hanging inverted from branches. When the chance presents itself, it swoops!

pokemon.name: MAMOSWINE
pokemon.description: Its impressive tusks are made of ice. The population thinned when it turned warm after the ice age.

pokemon.name: PORYGONZ
pokemon.description: Additional software was installed to make it a better Pokemon. It began acting oddly, however.

pokemon.name: GALLADE
pokemon.description: A master of courtesy and swordsmanship, it fights using extending swords on its elbows.

pokemon.name: PROBOPASS
pokemon.description: It exudes strong magnetism from all over. It controls three small units called Mini-Noses.

pokemon.name: DUSKNOIR
pokemon.description: The antenna on its head captures radio waves from the world of spirits that command it to take people there.

pokemon.name: FROSLASS
pokemon.description: It freezes foes with an icy breath nearly -60 degrees F. What seems to be its body is actually hollow.

pokemon.name: ROTOM
pokemon.description: Its body is composed of plasma. It is known to infiltrate electronic devices and wreak havoc.

pokemon.name: UXIE
pokemon.description: Known as "The Being of Knowledge." It is said that it can wipe out the memory of those who see its eyes.

pokemon.name: MESPRIT
pokemon.description: Known as "The Being of Emotion." It taught humans the nobility of sorrow, pain, and joy.

pokemon.name: AZELF
pokemon.description: Known as "The Being of Willpower." It sleeps at the bottom of a lake to keep the world in balance.

pokemon.name: DIALGA
pokemon.description: It has the power to control time. It appears in Sinnoh-region myths as an ancient deity.

pokemon.name: PALKIA
pokemon.description: It has the ability to distort space. It is described as a deity in Sinnoh-region mythology.

pokemon.name: HEATRAN
pokemon.description: It dwells in volcanic caves. It digs in with its cross-shaped feet to crawl on ceilings and walls.

pokemon.name: REGIGIGAS
pokemon.description: There is an enduring legend that states this Pokemon towed continents with ropes.

pokemon.name: GIRATINA
pokemon.description: A Pokemon that is said to live in a world on the reverse side of ours. It appears in an ancient cemetery.

pokemon.name: CRESSELIA
pokemon.description: Shiny particles are released from its wings like a veil. It is said to represent the crescent moon.

pokemon.name: PHIONE
pokemon.description: A Pokemon that lives in warm seas. It inflates the flotation sac on its head to drift and search for food.

pokemon.name: MANAPHY
pokemon.description: Born on a cold seafloor, it will swim great distances to return to its birthplace.

pokemon.name: DARKRAI
pokemon.description: It can lull people to sleep and make them dream. It is active during nights of the new moon.

pokemon.name: SHAYMIN
pokemon.description: It lives in flower patches and avoids detection by curling up to look like a flowering plant.

pokemon.name: ARCEUS
pokemon.description: It is described in mythology as the Pokemon that shaped the universe with its 1,000 arms.
